titles: The case of William Gutteridge, and other glass-makers, against passing a pattent for incorporating Sir Joseph Herne, and others, by the name of the glass-makers in the cities of London and Westminster, and ten miles compass of the same
author: Gutteridge, William, fl. 1680.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
keywords: Herne, Joseph, --  Sir --  Early works to 1800.
